DeleteEvent.name: DeleteEvent
DeleteEvent.description: Represents a record that has been soft deleted.

DeletedById.description: The ID of the user who deleted the record.

DeletedDate.description: The date and time when the record was deleted.

Record.description: The ID of the record that was deleted.

RecordName.description: The name of the record that was deleted.

SobjectName.description: The type of record that was deleted, for example, Account.
